flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-35 = <<59-35=42>>42 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 42 seashells which is 42*(1/4) = <<42*(1/4)=21/2>>21/2 seashells
They are now left with 59-21/2 = <<59-21/2=97/2>>97/2 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
